conbody.p: You may need to update LDAP users when adding a new Active Directory Server for integration with SenSage AP or to schedule periodic updates of users from AD/LDAP to ensure you have the most current user information in SenSage AP.

There are two ways to specify users for synchronization from AD/LDAP: on-demand and scheduled. When you choose to update on-demand you can selectively choose an individual AD server to synchronize with Analyzer. When you choose to create a schedule, then the user registry of Analyzer is updated with all the AD servers that are configured with the system.

ol.li: Go to the Analyzer and select AdministrationLDAP from the dropdown submenu.

For Immediate Update:
Select the Active Directory/LDAP server where the users reside.
Figure 9-18: Immediate Update of Users from LDAP
Click Update users from LDAP for immediate update.

For Scheduled Update:
Check Schedule updating users from LDAP.
Figure 9-19: IScheduled Update of Users from LDAP
Enter Start at: time and date and how often to repeat the updates. c Click Save Schedule.
